Uses of Interface
com.sun.net.ssl.TrustManager

Packages that use TrustManager
com.sun.net.ssl Provides classes related to creating and configuring secure socket factories. 
 

Uses of TrustManager in com.sun.net.ssl
 

Subinterfaces of TrustManager in com.sun.net.ssl
 interface X509TrustManager
          Instance of this interface manage which X509 certificates may be used to authenticate the remote side of a secure socket.
